text: victim who was just 10 years old and
denied permission for an abortion by the
Indian Supreme Court last month has
given birth to a baby girl the child is
not aware that she's given birth during
her pregnancy she was told her bulge was
because she had a big stone in her
stomach the girl alleges she was raped
several times in the past seven months
by her uncle who has been arrested well
our correspondent Sanjoy Majumdar is in
Delhi and joins us now just tell us a
little bit more about the background to
this case well this is a case we've been
following quite closely now for a well
over a month and also one that became a
bit of a talking point not just because
the horrific nature of the case itself
but because it became part of a very
controversial legal challenge it was
only a month ago that it was discovered
that the little girl was pregnant
because she basically complained of a
stomachache she was taken to the doctor
and that's when they'd realized that she
was actually quite at quite an advanced
stage of a pregnancy about 30 weeks
and under Indian law you can't terminate
a pregnancy beyond 20 weeks her parents
then approach the Supreme Court
basically asking for an abortion to be
conducted because they were very worried
that she was far too little to give
birth to her to give birth to a baby but
the court overruled that plea on the
grounds that doctors suggested that it
would be too risky for her to undergo
any kind of termination earlier today
she gave birth by a caesarean section we
understand that both mother and baby are
doing well and it's very likely that the
little baby will be put up for adoption
and do we know what will happen to the
10 year old girl now well the 10 year
old girl at the moment is still is still
in hospital and then she will go back to
live with her family their family's made
it very clear that they want nothing to
have nothing to do with her child which
is why the the baby will be put up for
adoption and as far as we are aware she
was never be she was never told she was
pregnant and and we understand that she
didn't even realize or hasn't been told
that she's given birth to a child they
are obviously going to hope that you
know she can receive some kind of
counseling and uncared to basically put
this chapter of a life behind her but
yes it's a story that a lot of people in
India have been talking about it's a big
issue in India
sexual abuse of women and sexual abuse
of children government and UNICEF
statistics suggest that a child under
the age of 16 is raped every two and a
half hours in India and this case has
just brought this fact to light Sanjoy
Majumdar in Delhi thank you
